name: WCError.Code
desc: Constants for errors during a session.

items.name: case genericError
items.desc: An error that occurs when there is an unknown problem.

items.name: case sessionNotSupported
items.desc: An error indicating that the current device doesn’t support the use of session objects.

items.name: case sessionMissingDelegate
items.desc: An error indicating that the WatchKit extension doesn’t have a valid extension delegate to process events.

items.name: case sessionNotActivated
items.desc: An error indicating that the other device doesn’t have an active session.

items.name: case deviceNotPaired
items.desc: An error indicating that the current device doesn’t have a paired counterpart.

items.name: case watchAppNotInstalled
items.desc: An error indicating that the Watch app isn’t an installed app on the user’s Apple Watch.

items.name: case notReachable
items.desc: An error indicating that the counterpart app isn’t reachable.

items.name: case invalidParameter
items.desc: An error indicating that a parameter is invalid.

items.name: case payloadTooLarge
items.desc: An error indicating an attempt to send an item that exceeds the maximum size limit.

items.name: case payloadUnsupportedTypes
items.desc: An error indicating that a dictionary contains nonproperty list types.

items.name: case messageReplyFailed
items.desc: An error that occurs when the system can’t return the reply.

items.name: case messageReplyTimedOut
items.desc: An error that occurs when the counterpart app doesn’t return a reply in time.

items.name: case fileAccessDenied
items.desc: An error indicating that the system can’t transfer a file because it is inaccessible.

items.name: case deliveryFailed
items.desc: An error that occurs when the system can’t deliver the payload.

items.name: case insufficientSpace
items.desc: An error indicating that there isn’t enough space on the receiving side to store the data.

items.name: case sessionInactive
items.desc: An error indicating that the session is inactive.

items.name: case transferTimedOut
items.desc: An error that occurs when the transfer reaches the timeout limit before it completes.

items.name: case companionAppNotInstalled
items.desc: An error indicating that the companion hasn’t installed the app.

items.name: case watchOnlyApp
items.desc: An error indicating that the app is a watch-only app.
